changeSet.author: savinov_vu
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS registry ( id integer NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('registry_id_seq'), organization integer, fcs VARCHAR (255), short_fcs VARCHAR (255), position integer, citizenship integer, birth_year VARCHAR (255), path VARCHAR (255), city integer, treatmentplace VARCHAR (255), hospital integer, patient_status VARCHAR (255), contacted_number integer, country integer, status VARCHAR (255), register_at VARCHAR (255), unregister_at VARCHAR (255), first_test_at VARCHAR (255), death_at VARCHAR (255), comment VARCHAR (255), disease_number VARCHAR (255), is_fully_vaccinated VARCHAR (255), fully_vaccinated_at VARCHAR (255), is_first_component_vaccinated VARCHAR (255), first_vaccine_at VARCHAR (255), CONSTRAINT registry_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id) );
